episodes.title: The Number 1 reason why people join a cult (like Jeovah's Witnesses one)
episodes.description:
I've been raised in Jeovah's Witnesses cult and left them when I was 19 y.o, now I'm ready to talk consciously and peacefully about what I think on this very delicate matter. 

Freedom is one of the most precious things we have and no one should take that away from us. 

Hope this video helps you understand what is the main reason why people decide to join a cult like Jeovah's Witnesses cult. 

00:00 why I made this video
00:22 who I am
00:48 the question
2:11 the main reason
3:07 application to Jeovah's Witnesses core beliefs
4:50 final consideration
5:36 important conclusion

#jehovahswitnesses 

I am italian so please be nice if you comment on my english pronunciation :)

Here's some sources you can read and research about what I'm talking in the video:

(I tried to copy paste the links but YouTube said I need a couple of months using this channel to make it technically possible (for credibility) so please research, read, study, never stop at one video or one answer.)


I have an italian IG page: instagram.com/una_del_mondo

If you're a former Jeovah's Witness and would want to work in 1:1 sessions with me, please feel free to send an email at: unadelmondo@gmail.com 


Love you all, keep your mind open and free, always.
